definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The intelligence information work is in the guiding position in the whole public security work.
sentences.chinese: 情报信息工作在整个公安工作中居于先导地位。

sentences.english: Error is often the precursor of what is correct, but conceit is the prelude to a fall.
sentences.chinese: 错误往往是正确的先导，骄傲是跌跤的前奏。

sentences.english: Valves are direct acting and pilot-type two kinds.
sentences.chinese: 减压阀有直动型和先导型两种。

sentences.english: It seems Aten is the forerunner of Yahweh.
sentences.chinese: 看来，宏正自动科技是先导的雅威。

sentences.english: A kind of pilot-operated water hydraulic relief valve was invented and its principle was presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了所研制的先导式纯水溢流阀及其工作原理。

sentences.english: Guiding role of economic theorization in the reforms.
sentences.chinese: 经济改革要以经济理论的发展为先导。

sentences.english: Some of the dim branches exhibit bright recoil leaders.
sentences.chinese: 一部分暗淡的分叉显示出闪亮的反冲先导。

sentences.english: Oil reducing valve belongs to the pilot valve piston valve.
sentences.chinese: 进口油用减压阀属于先导活塞式减压阀。

sentences.english: Parekkekogram type, pilot valve control system, toggle control.
sentences.chinese: 平行四边形，先导系统，肘节式操纵。

sentences.english: The interest is the precursor for the non-artistic students to bring up them design ability.
sentences.chinese: 对于非艺术类学生来说，培养设计能力，兴趣是先导。

sentences.english: The thought is the motion forerunner, only then the understanding arriving, the work can arrive.
sentences.chinese: 思想是行动的先导，只有认识到位，工作才能到位。

sentences.english: To emancipate the mind is the precursor of reforming and opening-up policy.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想是改革开放的思想先导。

sentences.english: Your generation is definitely leading the way, and people who are older are beginning to wake up as well.
sentences.chinese: 你的课题是前驱先导，当然老一辈也开始觉醒。

sentences.english: The liberation of thought is always the pioneer of social development's major changes and leaps.
sentences.chinese: 社会发展的重大转变和飞跃都是以思想解放为先导的。

sentences.english: They were in the van of civilization.
The facts show that the elementary research is the precursor in exploring the wide uses of silk besides clothing materials.
sentences.chinese: 说明基础研究是开拓绢丝衣料外广阔用途的重要先导。

definition: to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
main line (of communication)/main thread (of a plotline or concept)/central theme
